name: cuttlebone
description: ukagaka shell renderer for web browser

scripts.build: rm -rf output/*; npm run build-src; npm run build-test
scripts.build-src: node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --noEmitOnError --noImplicitAny --rootDir ./ --outdir output  src/*.ts; cat output/src/*.js      > lib/cuttlebone.js
scripts.build-test: node node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --noEmitOnError --noImplicitAny --rootDir ./ --outdir output test/*.ts; cat output/test/test*.js > output/test/all.js
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; tsd update --save --overwrite
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build; npm run start; npm run demo;

author: Ikagaka
